agents
Class BayesianAgent

java.lang.Object
  negotiator.Agent
      agents.BayesianAgent
Direct Known Subclasses:
BayesianAgentNS
public class BayesianAgent
extends Agent

Wrapper for opponentmodelspace, so that it is a neat utilityspace that we can give to the bidspace.

Author:
Tim Baarslag & Dmytro Tykhonov
